column4: I am trying to backup my entire install (not just the files, but all of the MBR stuff that I don't understand too I think) to a single file (like a zip or ?? maybe an iso?)  so if the operation I'm about to perform breaks everything I have a backup plan.
Check out the open source project clonezilla.
Clonezilla will work make an exact image of your install which you can reimage with.
